programme.title: Lola rennt
Lola rennt
programme.desc:
Lola rennt: Directed by Tom Tykwer. With Franka Potente, Moritz Bleibtreu, Herbert Knaup, Nina Petri. After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0130827/","name":"Lola rennt","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmU5ZjFmYjQtYmNjZC00Yjk4LWI1ZTQtZDJiMjM0YjQyNDU0L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0130827/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ganstertrippin"},"dateCreated":"2002-01-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Modern Masterpiece","reviewBody":"Run Lola Run. What a cool title.

It tells the tale of a young man, Manni, who one day was doing a job for crime boss. The job was just to deliver a bag of money to him with 100000 DM which roughly translates to $20000 or $25000 US. Unfortunatly Manni leaves the money on a train and is totally screwed unless he can get the money back in 20 minutes. So he calls his girlfriend, Lola (and no, she is not the girl from The Fifth Element), for help. From here the film follows Lola choosing three paths, each going for 20 minutes, to getting the money for Manni.

 Run Lola Run is a wonderful study of how life consists of the paths we take. Some say there is no right and wrong paths to take in life, but Run Lola Run seems to illustrate that the right path is the best. Franka Potente (Lola) does a wonderful job and must have lost about 10 pounds for all the running she does in this film. But the real star here is Tom Tykwer (the director), who vison for this film is so fantastic and cool.

In terms of coolness, this has to be one of the coolest movies ever made. It contains black and white camera, animation, three or four different types of slow motion, fast motion and the most amazing still shots taken for a film which is enough to keep anyone interested. Plus this film is only 80 minutes long, but luckily it feels about 20 minutes longer than that.

 After being one of the most talked about films of 1998, I would safely say that Run Lola Run has inspired a large number of film makers. Run Lola Run is a modern masterpiece and should pave the way for the future of films."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":194595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1998-08-20","keywords":"race against the clock,repeated event,fate,running,butterfly effect","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Run Lola Run","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi880649753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ2NmNlYmUtN2Q1Mi00NWRhLTgzM2ItMjhhZGE0NjU3ODFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ2NmNlYmUtN2Q1Mi00NWRhLTgzM2ItMjhhZGE0NjU3ODFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Run Lola Run"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001953/","name":"Moritz Bleibtreu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460578/","name":"Herbert Knaup"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055954/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075650/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0878756/","name":"Tom Tykwer"}],"duration":"PT1H21M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Robin Hood
Robin Hood – Ein Leben für Richard Löwenherz
programme.desc: Robin Hood: Directed by John Irvin. With Patrick Bergin, Uma Thurman, Jürgen Prochnow, Edward Fox. The Swashbuckling legend of Robin Hood unfolds in the 12th century when the mighty Normans ruled England with an iron fist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0102797/","name":"Robin Hood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjdkMzUyMTAtNzk0MC00OTUxLWFhMWMtYTgxY2YyMWJmMzk3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjUyNDk2ODc@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Swashbuckling legend of Robin Hood unfolds in the 12th century when the mighty Normans ruled England with an iron fist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0102797/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"imdb-4883"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just seen it - MUCH better than Costner version","reviewBody":"This has just been run on British TV. What a pleasure to see something from Hollywood that feels realistic when referring to something over here (no US cavalry riding to the rescue at the critical moment!!). Apart from that it is also well made, enjoyable and I'm just sorry I didn't start the recorder at the beginning. Uma Thurman is not the most gorgeous Marion I have seen (not too bad either though), but she was believable and that counts for a lot. The action scenes had a touch of authenticity about them that is all too often missing (for example when Robin was handed a staff by Will to battle with John Little it was a thick branch, forked at one end and obviously from a tree, not a martial arts supplier - just the sort of thing that might have been picked up in a real situation <accepting that something like that might well not have been lying around unless it was rotten>). All round, a film I will watch next time it is screened and I hope I manage to get the DVD recorder going in time next time."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5046,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"1991-05-13","keywords":"12th century,living in a cave,prince,kissing under the mistletoe,sherwood forest","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Robin Hood (1991)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2020673305","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0YjEzNDMtZTlmMy00ZmQ2LWEwM2QtMTk2OWVhMTg0MWFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY0YjEzNDMtZTlmMy00ZmQ2LWEwM2QtMTk2OWVhMTg0MWFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for this action film about the noble renegade"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000920/","name":"Patrick Bergin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000235/","name":"Uma Thurman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001638/","name":"Jürgen Prochnow"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0410139/","name":"John Irvin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032009/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075650/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720338/","name":"Sam Resnick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0569819/","name":"John McGrath"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: xXx
xXx – Triple X
programme.desc: xXx: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Vin Diesel, Asia Argento, Marton Csokas, Samuel L. Jackson. An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295701/","name":"xXx","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZjZmM1ZDctNDhlZi00Mzk1LWFjNWItYzIxNGY2OWYzYjJmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ2MjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An extreme sports athlete, Xander Cage, is recruited by the government on a special mission.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295701/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"robjan1"},"dateCreated":"2002-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Turn off your brain and enjoy the ride...","reviewBody":"I would not dare to insult anyone's intelligence. With that said let me add, this movie will not insult yours, if you see it with the right attitude. Adrenaline pump set for full tilt boogie. This is not an intellectual movie, it is not a love story, and it certainly is not Rambo. What it is, is a series of action shorts connected by a common thread that is very much in vogue. Good guys vs. bad guys/terrorists and in so doing, overcome insurmountable odds to, 1. Do the " right thing " 2. Save the day, 3.Have a hell of a time doing it and 4. GET THE GIRL! If, you expect anymore than that, you will be disappointed. So, turn off you brain and enjoy the ride. If you enjoy extreme sports, action genre movies and bad guys with eastern european accents, sign up get ready to party. This is your movie! Oh, btw. Make sure you see this movie in a theatre that has GREAT sound. You will be rewarded."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177143,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-11","keywords":"snowboard,time bomb,kidnapping,tattoo on torso,adventure hero","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"xXx","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi451084569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxNjc0OGItNWY2ZS00ZmRjLTlhOTEtNmI1MTFjZDk3ZTY2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000782/","name":"Asia Argento"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0190744/","name":"Marton Csokas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929186/","name":"Rich Wilkes"}],"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Outpost
The Outpost – Überleben ist alles
programme.desc:
The Outpost: Directed by Rod Lurie. With Scott Eastwood, Caleb Landry Jones, Orlando Bloom, Jack Kesy. A small team of U.S. soldiers battle against hundreds of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3833480/","name":"The Outpost","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWYyMzNjY2EtODVmYi00ODBmLWIyNGMtNDdhMGViY2RhNjcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDExMzMxNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A small team of U.S. soldiers battle against hundreds of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3833480/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pedro380085"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great war movie, don't get demotivated by the naysayers","reviewBody":"This is a great movie. Indeed there are, but there are a couple of great things about it:


* this was a movie based on true events
* the action scenes are exciting and provide an engaging visual felling
* there is no sugar coating, the actions depicted on the movie real and truthful


It follows a similar line to 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi, which I liked a lot too. The storytelling around the lives of each soldier are built differently, but the goal here is not to explore the lives of each of them, but to understand the challenges of fighting a war in a place clearly indefensible. There are no protections against the mountains and everyone knows it, even the viewer as you get the first glimpse of the environment the soldiers were put in.

I recommend this movie and I think you will like it if you also like movie based on true events.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29174,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-07-03","keywords":"taliban,based on true story,battle,afghanistan,sniper","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Outpost","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1209384473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5ZWNjNTMtMTIxMC00NzAzLTg1YjUtZTA1Y2E4OThhZTZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5ZWNjNTMtMTIxMC00NzAzLTg1YjUtZTA1Y2E4OThhZTZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207222/","name":"Scott Eastwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2655177/","name":"Caleb Landry Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527109/","name":"Rod Lurie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0646497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0799957/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0651078/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848496/","name":"Paul Tamasy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2053216/","name":"Eric Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1311488/","name":"Jake Tapper"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 3833480, Title: The Outpost, --- Description: The Outpost: Directed by Rod Lurie. With Scott Eastwood, Caleb Landry Jones, Orlando Bloom, Jack Kesy. A small team of U.S. soldiers battle against hundreds of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3833480/","name":"The Outpost","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWYyMzNjY2EtODVmYi00ODBmLWIyNGMtNDdhMGViY2RhNjcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDExMzMxNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A small team of U.S. soldiers battle against hundreds of Taliban fighters in Afghanistan.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3833480/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"pedro380085","dateCreated":"2020-07-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great war movie, don't get demotivated by the naysayers","reviewBody":"This is a great movie. Indeed there are, but there are a couple of great things about it:


* this was a movie based on true events
* the action scenes are exciting and provide an engaging visual felling
* there is no sugar coating, the actions depicted on the movie real and truthful


It follows a similar line to 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi, which I liked a lot too. The storytelling around the lives of each soldier are built differently, but the goal here is not to explore the lives of each of them, but to understand the challenges of fighting a war in a place clearly indefensible. There are no protections against the mountains and everyone knows it, even the viewer as you get the first glimpse of the environment the soldiers were put in.

I recommend this movie and I think you will like it if you also like movie based on true events.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":29174,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-07-03","keywords":"taliban,based on true story,battle,afghanistan,sniper","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Outpost","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1209384473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5ZWNjNTMtMTIxMC00NzAzLTg1YjUtZTA1Y2E4OThhZTZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5ZWNjNTMtMTIxMC00NzAzLTg1YjUtZTA1Y2E4OThhZTZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 1","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207222/","name":"Scott Eastwood","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2655177/","name":"Caleb Landry Jones","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527109/","name":"Rod Lurie"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0646497/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0799957/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0651078/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0848496/","name":"Paul Tamasy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2053216/","name":"Eric Johnson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1311488/","name":"Jake Tapper"],"duration":"PT2H3M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Family Man
Family Man – Eine himmlische Entscheidung
programme.desc: The Family Man: Directed by Brett Ratner. With Nicolas Cage, Téa Leoni, Don Cheadle, Jeremy Piven. A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0218967/","name":"The Family Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzYzMTQ4NDYtNWRkZi00NTYxLThlZDItMzI1MmU1MmU5ZWQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDA5Mjg5MjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0218967/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"whynotbacritic"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's A Wonderful Life in 2000","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be a very nice remix of "It's a Wonderful Life", much like "You've got Mail" is a remix of "Pride and Prejudice" (and totally hints at this within the film). A classic film to make you reexamine your own life, and think about what is really important and meaningful for you, what is success and happiness? Young dreamers in love with their successful careers instead of each other, find out that maybe their love really was meant to be. This is what Nicholas Cage finds out, and when he wakes up from the dream of what 'could have been', he rushes to stop 'loosing her' again, and hopefully still live the happily ever after dream. Nicholas Cage provides a stunning and comical performance in character, from the aggressive businessman - big business and small business - to a loving father and husband with his charming sense of humor. Quite a romantic film to watch with that 'someone special' during the holidays."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":107083,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2001-09-12","keywords":"christmas,parallel universe,career man,reflection,crisis of conscience","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi318685465","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWRmZjg2MTgtN2NmMS00ODAyLTg4OWItODFlMTRiZTBmNDY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWRmZjg2MTgtN2NmMS00ODAyLTg4OWItODFlMTRiZTBmNDY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000332/","name":"Don Cheadle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0711840/","name":"Brett Ratner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064908/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009876/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224606/","name":"David Diamond"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919289/","name":"David Weissman"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Gremlins
Gremlins – Kleine Monster
programme.desc: Gremlins: Directed by Joe Dante. With Hoyt Axton, John Louie, Keye Luke, Don Steele. A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087363/","name":"Gremlins","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDVjN2FkYTQtNTBlOC00MjM5LTgzMWEtZWRlNGUyYmNiOTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087363/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tymooda11"},"dateCreated":"2017-01-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"What a blast!","reviewBody":"Joe Dante's "Gremlins" is an absolutely, amazingly fun time. The concept of the Gremlins themselves being so intriguing and fun, and face it, Gizmo is one of the cutest creatures in cinema history. While this movies first 20 minutes are a bit boring, once the story and absolute fun insanity begins you'll be having such a good time that the run time of the film will completely slip by. I have loved this film since a young age, and sure it may be nostalgia, but god do I really love this movie. I highly recommend watching this on a cold winter night, with hot chocolate, and a warm bowl of popcorn. I guarantee that you will have a fun time with this. It's not a thought provoking film, it won't change your life, but it is a fun ride , completely worth it's length","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":211595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"1984-06-08","keywords":"chinatown,1980s,christmas,monster,gift","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Gremlins","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2626338585","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjYwZmFlNTAtY2RkMi00MWQ2LThmMjUtMjgwZmQyMzA1NjMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjYwZmFlNTAtY2RkMi00MWQ2LThmMjUtMjgwZmQyMzA1NjMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Original Theatrical Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002090/","name":"Zach Galligan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000121/","name":"Phoebe Cates"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001924/","name":"Hoyt Axton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001102/","name":"Joe Dante"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Four Christmases
Mein Schatz, unsere Familie und ich
programme.desc:
Four Christmases: Directed by Seth Gordon. With Vince Vaughn, Reese Witherspoon, Robert Duvall, Sissy Spacek. A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0369436/","name":"Four Christmases","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2MjA0NDAwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU4MTM5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0369436/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tonyzeno75"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"How does this Movie only have a 5.7","reviewBody":"This is movie is Hilarious it has now worked it way into our Family's always watch during the Holidays up there with Planes Trains and Automobiles and NL X-mas Vacation.

This is Vaughn on his A-Game, in my experience, You either love or hate Vince.. I personally have been a Fan since Swingers and Made. Witherspoon is decent and holds her own, but this is Vince's Movie for sure.

The scene where they visit Vaughn's Dad (the Amazing Robert Duvall) along with life long partner in crime Actor/MEGA Director Jon Favreau and the surprisingly natural actor Tim McGraw alone is worth the rental of this movie alone, and Mother Visit with Sissy Spacek and a Cameo from Swingers as her new Husband is also Fantastic.

If youre not laughing out loud during these 2 scenes you dont know what Comedy is..

Check this out if you wasnt to Laugh... a Fan of Vince Vaughn/Jon Favreau etc.

Vaughn's performance is on point here.. just as "Wedding Crashers" and "The Breakup"

For some younger great VV performance's Check out "Clay Pigeons" and "Domestic Disturbance"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":69312,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-12-17","keywords":"exploding television,christmas in title,christmas season,parent,reference to baby it's cold outside the song","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Four Christmases: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1159200793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0ODQzNTY1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzYwMzQ5MQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0ODQzNTY1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzYwMzQ5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the theatrical trailer for Four Christmases, directed by Seth Gordon."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000681/","name":"Vince Vaughn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005460/","name":"Mary Steenburgen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1164861/","name":"Seth Gordon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0180082/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0020820/","name":"Matt Allen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933128/","name":"Caleb Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524190/","name":"Jon Lucas"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:

The IMAX experience was stunning.

I did not expect to enjoy the story as much as I did. Simple but quite heartwarming.

Although it started a bit slow, it continued to gain momentum (no train analogy intended) through its conclusion. I was not a great lover of the animation of the human characters, but the other animation, whether it be the train, the scenery, the reindeer, or the elves (are elves human?) was quite well done.

programme.title: New Year's Eve
Happy New Year
programme.desc:
New Year's Eve: Directed by Garry Marshall. With Michelle Pfeiffer, Zac Efron, Charlotte Marshall-Fricker, Fiona Choi. The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1598822/","name":"New Year's Eve","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2Mzg2MDQxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc3NTY5Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1598822/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JimmyCollins"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too many story lines make New Years Eve a bit of a dud.","reviewBody":"I rather enjoy the odd ensemble comedy such as this film, I somewhat enjoyed Valentines Day and I really enjoyed He's Just Not That Into You, but what those film had but this doesn't is a fewer amount of plot lines. There's just too much going on in this film, far too many characters, as soon as I found myself interested in one plot its segment would end, you can never get really attached to one set of characters.

For me the best storyline was the Michelle Pfieffer and Zefron plot, it was really the only one with a bit of substance, I actually think a full movie of that story would be great, also the Jessica Biel and Seth Meyers plot was rather funny thanks to the highly underrated Ms Biel. This movie is entertaining enough I suppose but it's also lacking any real great laugh out loud moments, the only time I laughed was when Jessica Biel was in labour, she could do some great comedy if given the chance.

Lea Michele manages to bring her great screen charisma to the big screen, she is very fun to watch and her rendition of Aude Lang Syne was lovely and a nice way to end the movie.

If this movie had about four or five less stories happening this movie would have been much better, it's not horrible by any standards but it's not excellent either, also this may sound mean but Sofia Vergara is possibly the most annoying actress alive, at least they didn't put a decent actress in the most annoying role in the film. I mean it's worth paying to see the excellent dance scene between Zefron and Pfieffer over the end credits.

OK, but basically it's exactly the same as Valentines Day but with more actors and a lot less substance.

Enjoy. Maybe.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83887,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2011-12-09","keywords":"ensemble film,new year,new year's eve,singer,expecting","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi673095449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NDM0MTc3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU1MzU4Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NDM0MTc3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDU1MzU4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of several couples and singles in New York intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000572/","name":"Sarah Jessica Parker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004754/","name":"Jessica Biel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005110/","name":"Ashton Kutcher"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005190/","name":"Garry Marshall"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176486/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0297545/","name":"Katherine Fugate"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1598822, Title: New Year's Eve, --- Description: New Year's Eve: Directed by Garry Marshall. With Michelle Pfeiffer, Zac Efron, Charlotte Marshall-Fricker, Fiona Choi. The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1598822/","name":"New Year's Eve","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI2Mzg2MDQxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzc3NTY5Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1598822/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"JimmyCollins","dateCreated":"2011-12-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Too many story lines make New Years Eve a bit of a dud.","reviewBody":"I rather enjoy the odd ensemble comedy such as this film, I somewhat enjoyed Valentines Day and I really enjoyed He's Just Not That Into You, but what those film had but this doesn't is a fewer amount of plot lines. There's just too much going on in this film, far too many characters, as soon as I found myself interested in one plot its segment would end, you can never get really attached to one set of characters.

For me the best storyline was the Michelle Pfieffer and Zefron plot, it was really the only one with a bit of substance, I actually think a full movie of that story would be great, also the Jessica Biel and Seth Meyers plot was rather funny thanks to the highly underrated Ms Biel. This movie is entertaining enough I suppose but it's also lacking any real great laugh out loud moments, the only time I laughed was when Jessica Biel was in labour, she could do some great comedy if given the chance.

Lea Michele manages to bring her great screen charisma to the big screen, she is very fun to watch and her rendition of Aude Lang Syne was lovely and a nice way to end the movie.

If this movie had about four or five less stories happening this movie would have been much better, it's not horrible by any standards but it's not excellent either, also this may sound mean but Sofia Vergara is possibly the most annoying actress alive, at least they didn't put a decent actress in the most annoying role in the film. I mean it's worth paying to see the excellent dance scene between Zefron and Pfieffer over the end credits.

OK, but basically it's exactly the same as Valentines Day but with more actors and a lot less substance.

Enjoy. programme.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
Der Grinch
programme.desc:
How the Grinch Stole Christmas: Directed by Ron Howard. With Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Kelley, Jeffrey Tambor. On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0170016/","name":"How the Grinch Stole Christmas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNiNTczNzEtMjQyZC00MjFmLTkzMDMtODk4ZGMyZmE0N2E4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0170016/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"toffeesi"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Christmas Giggles","reviewBody":"I have just read the lead comment for this film that is on the front page with the voting results and cast run down.

Why is it that some people can not take a film for what it is supposed to be.

This film is supposed to be a light hearted, tonge in cheek, family comedy, things to make the kids laugh and things for the adults, and that is exactly what this film does.

I laughed my nuts off at this film, I thought Carey put in a great performance and the whole film (if watched at Christmas) really give you a bit of festive cheer

So to all of you film reviewers stop trying to sound like film students and knock every film because it is not "Taxi Driver" or "The Godfather" and take films for what they are supposed to be, entertainment!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":223992,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2000-12-27","keywords":"christmas,dog,dr seuss,monster,the color green","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Grinch Stole Christmas","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi208601113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzY3N2I2MDMtNjMwYS00ZjY3LWFmODctM2E3MmQ0Njg2YTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzY3N2I2MDMtNjMwYS00ZjY3LWFmODctM2E3MmQ0Njg2YTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Universal Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000120/","name":"Jim Carrey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0597410/","name":"Taylor Momsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3679189/","name":"Kelley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000165/","name":"Ron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049831/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317450/","name":"Dr. Seuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0696949/","name":"Jeffrey Price"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0780620/","name":"Peter S. programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
Verrückte Weihnachten
programme.desc: Christmas with the Kranks: Directed by Joe Roth. With Tim Allen, Jamie Lee Curtis, Dan Aykroyd, M. Emmet Walsh. With their daughter, Blair, away, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0388419/","name":"Christmas with the Kranks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDMxODEwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzM4OTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"With their daughter, Blair, away, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0388419/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"the-movie-guy"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Have a Merry slapstick Christmas","reviewBody":"For the first time, Luther Krank (Tim Allen) and his wife Nora (Jamie Lee Curtis) are about to celebrate the holidays without their daughter Blair (Julie Gonzalo), who has just left for the Peace Corps in Peru. Luther sees a Caribbean cruise poster in a Chicago travel agency window, and he begins to plan the trip. First he must see how he will pay for the trip, so he comes up with an idea that if they skipped Christmas, they could go. He will save money by not buying a tree, having a party, or putting up decorations. The neighbors think he is crazy and want him to at least put Frosty the Snowman on his roof for the local decoration contest. The battle begins between the Kranks and their neighbors. Then Blair calls and tells her parents that she is flying home for Christmas with her fiancée. They have twenty-four hours to put up all the decorations and prepare for the Christmas party. The movie was based on a John Grisham book, 'Skipping Christmas'. It is a cute Christmas story with a lot of funny slapstick sketches. It reminds you of the Chevy Chase movie, 'National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation'. Tim Allen does a great job in several comedy scenes, especially, the scenes where he gets bowtox injections in his face and the suntan scene. (Columbia Pictures, Run time 1:39, Rated PG) (5/10)"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45929,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2004-11-24","keywords":"bikini,christmas,cat,singing,arrest","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Christmas with the Kranks","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2092826905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk0MTdmNTItZTQwMC00MTk5LTkyZTYtYjdjMGNkMzBkZjEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk0MTdmNTItZTQwMC00MTk5LTkyZTYtYjdjMGNkMzBkZjEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000741/","name":"Tim Allen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000130/","name":"Jamie Lee Curtis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005387/","name":"Joe Roth"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0125564/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001300/","name":"John Grisham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Family Man
Family Man – Eine himmlische Entscheidung
programme.desc: The Family Man: Directed by Brett Ratner. With Nicolas Cage, Téa Leoni, Don Cheadle, Jeremy Piven. A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0218967/","name":"The Family Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzYzMTQ4NDYtNWRkZi00NTYxLThlZDItMzI1MmU1MmU5ZWQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDA5Mjg5MjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0218967/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"whynotbacritic"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's A Wonderful Life in 2000","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be a very nice remix of "It's a Wonderful Life", much like "You've got Mail" is a remix of "Pride and Prejudice" (and totally hints at this within the film). A classic film to make you reexamine your own life, and think about what is really important and meaningful for you, what is success and happiness? Young dreamers in love with their successful careers instead of each other, find out that maybe their love really was meant to be. This is what Nicholas Cage finds out, and when he wakes up from the dream of what 'could have been', he rushes to stop 'loosing her' again, and hopefully still live the happily ever after dream. Nicholas Cage provides a stunning and comical performance in character, from the aggressive businessman - big business and small business - to a loving father and husband with his charming sense of humor. Quite a romantic film to watch with that 'someone special' during the holidays."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":107083,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2001-09-12","keywords":"christmas,parallel universe,career man,reflection,crisis of conscience","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi318685465","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWRmZjg2MTgtN2NmMS00ODAyLTg4OWItODFlMTRiZTBmNDY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWRmZjg2MTgtN2NmMS00ODAyLTg4OWItODFlMTRiZTBmNDY0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000115/","name":"Nicolas Cage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000332/","name":"Don Cheadle"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0711840/","name":"Brett Ratner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064908/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009876/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0224606/","name":"David Diamond"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0919289/","name":"David Weissman"}],"duration":"PT2H5M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Four Christmases
Mein Schatz, unsere Familie und ich
programme.desc:
Four Christmases: Directed by Seth Gordon. With Vince Vaughn, Reese Witherspoon, Robert Duvall, Sissy Spacek. A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0369436/","name":"Four Christmases","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2MjA0NDAwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTU4MTM5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0369436/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tonyzeno75"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"How does this Movie only have a 5.7","reviewBody":"This is movie is Hilarious it has now worked it way into our Family's always watch during the Holidays up there with Planes Trains and Automobiles and NL X-mas Vacation.

This is Vaughn on his A-Game, in my experience, You either love or hate Vince.. I personally have been a Fan since Swingers and Made. Witherspoon is decent and holds her own, but this is Vince's Movie for sure.

The scene where they visit Vaughn's Dad (the Amazing Robert Duvall) along with life long partner in crime Actor/MEGA Director Jon Favreau and the surprisingly natural actor Tim McGraw alone is worth the rental of this movie alone, and Mother Visit with Sissy Spacek and a Cameo from Swingers as her new Husband is also Fantastic.

If youre not laughing out loud during these 2 scenes you dont know what Comedy is..

Check this out if you wasnt to Laugh... a Fan of Vince Vaughn/Jon Favreau etc.

Vaughn's performance is on point here.. just as "Wedding Crashers" and "The Breakup"

For some younger great VV performance's Check out "Clay Pigeons" and "Domestic Disturbance"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":69312,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2008-12-17","keywords":"exploding television,christmas in title,christmas season,parent,reference to baby it's cold outside the song","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Four Christmases: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1159200793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0ODQzNTY1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzYwMzQ5MQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0ODQzNTY1NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzYwMzQ5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the theatrical trailer for Four Christmases, directed by Seth Gordon."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000702/","name":"Reese Witherspoon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000681/","name":"Vince Vaughn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005460/","name":"Mary Steenburgen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1164861/","name":"Seth Gordon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0180082/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0020820/","name":"Matt Allen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933128/","name":"Caleb Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524190/","name":"Jon Lucas"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Polar Express
Der Polarexpress
programme.desc:
The Polar Express: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Tom Hanks, Leslie Zemeckis, Eddie Deezen, Nona Gaye. On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0338348/","name":"The Polar Express","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM1NTU0NTE4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTQ0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0338348/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sak007"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Should become a holiday classic","reviewBody":"A simple story . . . beautifully told . . . magnificently visualized.

The IMAX experience was stunning.

I did not expect to enjoy the story as much as I did. Simple but quite heartwarming.

Although it started a bit slow, it continued to gain momentum (no train analogy intended) through its conclusion. I was not a great lover of the animation of the human characters, but the other animation, whether it be the train, the scenery, the reindeer, or the elves (are elves human?) was quite well done. 

Perhaps the best review I can provide is that after I watched the Polar Express, I just felt happier.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":191455,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2004-12-22","keywords":"santa claus character,christmas movie,male protagonist,based on children's book,train engineer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Polar Express","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2954167065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI3MjkxZTctMTUzYy00MzJjLWE0OTUtMWI0MDM3NTE3MDdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI3MjkxZTctMTUzYy00MzJjLWE0OTUtMWI0MDM3NTE3MDdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A boy's fantastical train journey to the North Pole"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000158/","name":"Tom Hanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0178875/","name":"Chris Coppola"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005052/","name":"Michael Jeter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040620/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036807/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0885575/","name":"Chris Van Allsburg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0115310/","name":"William Broyles Jr."}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: We're No Angels
Wir sind keine Engel
programme.desc: We're No Angels: Directed by Michael Curtiz. With Humphrey Bogart, Aldo Ray, Peter Ustinov, Joan Bennett. Three Devil's Island escapees hide out in the house of a kindly merchant and repay his kindness by helping him and his family out of several crises." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0048801/","name":"We're No Angels","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FjY2ViOWUtODk2Yi00NWJjLTgzYTQtOGQ2N2IxYzAwMmI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three Devil's Island escapees hide out in the house of a kindly merchant and repay his kindness by helping him and his family out of several crises.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0048801/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oftenwrong"},"dateCreated":"2002-04-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Top notch comedy","reviewBody":"This is one of the best comedies ever and one of my all-time favorites. I must have seen it a dozen or more times. The cast is perfect and Bogart shows he has a great talent for comedy. Rathbone plays the deliciously evil antagonist Cousin Andre, perfect in his role as the villain you love to hate which he pulls off with his usual deadpan style (has he ever played the good guy in any role?) Ustinov and Ray are perfect sidekicks for Bogart, their comedic style completely complements his. Carroll is perfect as the bumbling husband of the shop the convicts descend upon, initially planning on robbing him. I found the movie had all the necessary elements for a great side-splitting comedy along with some tender moments to show a contrast in the characters involved. I rate this one a nine of ten."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9017,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Romance"],"datePublished":"1955-09-08","keywords":"escaped convict,christmas,based on play,devil's island,safecracker","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"We're No Angels","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1343602201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTg0NTgzMDAtNThkMS00YTBkLThhNTktZjQ2YTcwODJjODgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTg0NTgzMDAtNThkMS00YTBkLThhNTktZjQ2YTcwODJjODgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000007/","name":"Humphrey Bogart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001811/","name":"Peter Ustinov"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712731/","name":"Aldo Ray"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002031/","name":"Michael Curtiz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0404062/","name":"Albert Husson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532030/","name":"Ranald MacDougall"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
Arthur Weihnachtsmann
programme.desc:
Arthur Christmas: Directed by Sarah Smith, Barry Cook. With James McAvoy, Hugh Laurie, Bill Nighy, Jim Broadbent. Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than two hours." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1430607/","name":"Arthur Christmas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY4Njk5OGQtZGMzYS00NmRhLTgxMzMtYzE0YzE1MDg4NDM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA4NjE0NjEy._V1_.jpg","description":"Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than two hours.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1430607/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Scrooge-3"},"dateCreated":"2011-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Delightfully charming","reviewBody":"Arthur Claus (James McAvoy) is the bumbling son of the reigning Santa, Malcolm Claus (Jim Broadbent). Arthur is relegated to the Letter Department where he can presumably do no damage. Arthur's brother Steve (Hugh Laurie) is the heir apparent to the title of Santa. Steve is handsome, confident, and in charge of the North Pole command center that monitors Santa's gift-giving flight around the world. The film opens with a bravura set piece showing how Santa is able to stop in millions of homes in one night. Hint: he has the help of thousands of elves. 

When Arthur discovers that one gift was accidentally undelivered, he becomes determined to get it to the unfortunate girl before Christmas sunrise. Even with the help of his retired grandsanta (Bill Nighy) and a perky elf (Ashley Jensen) from the Wrapping Department, can Arthur travel around the world in time?

There have been many movies over the years where Christmas must be saved from disaster, but Arthur Christmas has a very creative take on it. From the opening scene where it's established that Santa is really a dynasty through the centuries, a title handed down from father to son, to the paramilitary operation to get millions of presents delivered in one night, to the misadventures of Arthur and his grandsanta as they try to make sure one little girl is not disappointed, Arthur Christmas is fun, creative, and original. Produced by Aardman Animations in association with Sony Pictures Animation, this CGI animated film delivers Aardman's distinct brand of quirky humor and style. 

The art direction maintains the slightly skewed look of an Aardman claymation film. The character designs are asymmetric and the surface textures are realistic yet bold. The North Pole command center and Santa's high-tech sleigh are clean and modern. 

Sometimes celebrity voice talent backfires, but here it works beautifully, the English accents lending a sense of gravity that heightens the silliness. Bill Nighy is particularly good, conveying wisdom that is tinged with resentment of the modern gift-delivery methods his son and grandson use. 

Arthur Christmas is a funny, heartwarming, and poignant look at the Santa Claus mythos, adding a family dynamic that will resonate with children and adults. I expect Arthur Christmas will become a joyful holiday favorite for years to come.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54952,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-11-11","keywords":"christmas,elf,christmas eve,resentment,santa claus","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2677710361","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3ODQzNjA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODM5OTc4Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3ODQzNjA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODM5OTc4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On Christmas night at the North Pole, Santa's youngest son looks to use his father's high-tech operation for an urgent mission. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564215/","name":"James McAvoy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000980/","name":"Jim Broadbent"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0631490/","name":"Bill Nighy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0809877/","name":"Sarah Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176905/","name":"Barry Cook"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103531/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121181/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063165/","name":"Peter Baynham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0809877/","name":"Sarah Smith"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: James McAvoy (role=Arthur), Hugh Laurie (role=Steve), Bill Nighy (role=Grandsanta), Jim Broadbent (role=Santa), Imelda Staunton (role=Mrs Santa), Ashley Jensen (role=Bryony), Marc Wootton (role=Peter), Laura Linney (role=North Pole Computer), Eva Longoria (role=Chief De Silva), Ramona Marquez (role=Gwen), Michael Palin (role=Ernie Clicker), Sanjeev Bhaskar (role=Lead Elf)

IMDb data; ttnr: 1430607, Title: Arthur Christmas, --- Description: Arthur Christmas: Directed by Sarah Smith, Barry Cook. With James McAvoy, Hugh Laurie, Bill Nighy, Jim Broadbent. Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than two hours." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1430607/","name":"Arthur Christmas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY4Njk5OGQtZGMzYS00NmRhLTgxMzMtYzE0YzE1MDg4NDM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA4NjE0NjEy._V1_.jpg","description":"Santa's clumsy son Arthur sets out on a mission with Grandsanta to give out a present they misplaced to a young girl in less than two hours.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1430607/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Scrooge-3","dateCreated":"2011-11-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Delightfully charming","reviewBody":"Arthur Claus (James McAvoy) is the bumbling son of the reigning Santa, Malcolm Claus (Jim Broadbent). Arthur is relegated to the Letter Department where he can presumably do no damage. Arthur's brother Steve (Hugh Laurie) is the heir apparent to the title of Santa. Steve is handsome, confident, and in charge of the North Pole command center that monitors Santa's gift-giving flight around the world. The film opens with a bravura set piece showing how Santa is able to stop in millions of homes in one night. Hint: he has the help of thousands of elves. 

When Arthur discovers that one gift was accidentally undelivered, he becomes determined to get it to the unfortunate girl before Christmas sunrise. Even with the help of his retired grandsanta (Bill Nighy) and a perky elf (Ashley Jensen) from the Wrapping Department, can Arthur travel around the world in time?

There have been many movies over the years where Christmas must be saved from disaster, but Arthur Christmas has a very creative take on it. From the opening scene where it's established that Santa is really a dynasty through the centuries, a title handed down from father to son, to the paramilitary operation to get millions of presents delivered in one night, to the misadventures of Arthur and his grandsanta as they try to make sure one little girl is not disappointed, Arthur Christmas is fun, creative, and original. Produced by Aardman Animations in association with Sony Pictures Animation, this CGI animated film delivers Aardman's distinct brand of quirky humor and style. 

The art direction maintains the slightly skewed look of an Aardman claymation film. The character designs are asymmetric and the surface textures are realistic yet bold. The North Pole command center and Santa's high-tech sleigh are clean and modern. 

Sometimes celebrity voice talent backfires, but here it works beautifully, the English accents lending a sense of gravity that heightens the silliness. Bill Nighy is particularly good, conveying wisdom that is tinged with resentment of the modern gift-delivery methods his son and grandson use. 

Arthur Christmas is a funny, heartwarming, and poignant look at the Santa Claus mythos, adding a family dynamic that will resonate with children and adults. I expect Arthur Christmas will become a joyful holiday favorite for years to come.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":54952,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-11-11","keywords":"christmas,elf,christmas eve,resentment,santa claus","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2677710361","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3ODQzNjA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODM5OTc4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3ODQzNjA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODM5OTc4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On Christmas night at the North Pole, Santa's youngest son looks to use his father's high-tech operation for an urgent mission. ","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564215/","name":"James McAvoy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000980/","name":"Jim Broadbent","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0631490/","name":"Bill Nighy"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0809877/","name":"Sarah Smith","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176905/","name":"Barry Cook"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103531/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121181/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063165/","name":"Peter Baynham","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0809877/","name":"Sarah Smith"],"duration":"PT1H37M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Elf
Buddy – Der Weihnachtself
programme.desc: Elf: Directed by Jon Favreau. With Will Ferrell, James Caan, Bob Newhart, Ed Asner. Raised as an over-sized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0319343/","name":"Elf","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzUxNzkzMzQtYjIxZC00NzU0LThkYTQtZjNhNTljMTA1MDA1L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Raised as an over-sized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0319343/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"george.schmidt"},"dateCreated":"2003-11-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"An instant holiday classic: Ferrell's crowning achievement to date!","reviewBody":"ELF (2003) *** 1/2 Will Ferrell, James Caan, Mary Steenburgen, Edward Asner, Bob Newhart, Zooey Daschanel, Daniel Tay, Amy Sedaris, Faizon Love, Andy Richter, Kyle Gass, Michael Lerner, Artie Lange, Peter Billingsley, Peter Dinklage, Claire Lautier, Jon Favreau. Ferrell gives an inspired lunacy turn as a man who was raised by elves at The North Pole and discovers to his dismay he's actually human sparking his quest to be re-united with his long-lost father (Caan in an inspired bit of casting), a 'naughty-list' occupant, who works as a children's book publisher in New York City, just in time for Christmas. Hysterically funny thanks to the goofy yet sweet and wonderful turn by Ferrell (no one else could pull off the razor's edge of looking like an idiot yet retaining the innocent glee of a child and bares a striking resemblance to Tom Hanks' turn in 'BIG') with a great cast especially the beguilingly pretty Daschanel as his fellow Santa's Little Helper at Gimbels'who he falls in love with. Directed with style and witty warmth by Favreau (who has a cameo) and written by newcomer David Berenbaum with a smart, fun script that caters to all ages with a nostalgic nod to classic animated holiday specials for good measure. An instant holiday classic. Trivia note: Billingsley, best known as Ralphie from the yuletide cinematic classic, plays 'A CHRISTMAS STORY' the elf foreman!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":245772,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2004-06-16","keywords":"elf,christmas,father son relationship,santa claus,christmas movie","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Elf","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4112665","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI0MjU1ZjEtM2ExNS00YWJkLWJmMmMtOGIzMzM0ZTMwZWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI0MjU1ZjEtM2ExNS00YWJkLWJmMmMtOGIzMzM0ZTMwZWNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002071/","name":"Will Ferrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001001/","name":"James Caan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0627878/","name":"Bob Newhart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0269463/","name":"Jon Favreau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031707/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052918/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183854/","name":"David Berenbaum"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Nutcracker Christmas
Weihnachten auf der Bühne
programme.desc: A Nutcracker Christmas: Directed by Michael Lembeck. With Amy Acker, Sascha Radetsky, Sophia Lucia, Catherine Mary Stewart. When her niece is cast in The Philadelphia Ballet's production of the Nutcracker, a jaded ex-ballerina is forced to come to terms with the life and love she left behind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6132948/","name":"A Nutcracker Christmas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmRiZWM2OGQtNTZiNC00ZTEzLTgwZDAtN2UwZGI4Njg4NDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE4NjAwNjk@._V1_.jpg","description":"When her niece is cast in The Philadelphia Ballet's production of the Nutcracker, a jaded ex-ballerina is forced to come to terms with the life and love she left behind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6132948/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kz917-1"},"dateCreated":"2017-06-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Sugar Plum Dreams","reviewBody":"Amy Acker as Lily and Sascha Radetsky as Mark play ballet dancers and former flames that are reunited years later when Lily's niece is cast as Clara in a production of The Nutcracker that Mark is directing. Lily long ago left the ballet world and Mark after the death of her sister. Will they reunite, will the ballet go on? A delightful movie answers all of that and more. programme.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
Der Grinch
programme.desc:
How the Grinch Stole Christmas: Directed by Ron Howard. With Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Kelley, Jeffrey Tambor. On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0170016/","name":"How the Grinch Stole Christmas","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNiNTczNzEtMjQyZC00MjFmLTkzMDMtODk4ZGMyZmE0N2E4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0170016/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"toffeesi"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Christmas Giggles","reviewBody":"I have just read the lead comment for this film that is on the front page with the voting results and cast run down.

Why is it that some people can not take a film for what it is supposed to be.

This film is supposed to be a light hearted, tonge in cheek, family comedy, things to make the kids laugh and things for the adults, and that is exactly what this film does.

I laughed my nuts off at this film, I thought Carey put in a great performance and the whole film (if watched at Christmas) really give you a bit of festive cheer

So to all of you film reviewers stop trying to sound like film students and knock every film because it is not "Taxi Driver" or "The Godfather" and take films for what they are supposed to be, entertainment!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":223992,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2000-12-27","keywords":"christmas,dog,dr seuss,monster,the color green","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Grinch Stole Christmas","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi208601113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzY3N2I2MDMtNjMwYS00ZjY3LWFmODctM2E3MmQ0Njg2YTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzY3N2I2MDMtNjMwYS00ZjY3LWFmODctM2E3MmQ0Njg2YTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Universal Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000120/","name":"Jim Carrey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0597410/","name":"Taylor Momsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3679189/","name":"Kelley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000165/","name":"Ron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003687/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049831/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0317450/","name":"Dr. Seuss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0696949/","name":"Jeffrey Price"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0780620/","name":"Peter S. programme.title: Christmas with the Kranks
Verrückte Weihnachten
programme.desc: Christmas with the Kranks: Directed by Joe Roth. With Tim Allen, Jamie Lee Curtis, Dan Aykroyd, M. Emmet Walsh. With their daughter, Blair, away, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0388419/","name":"Christmas with the Kranks","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxMDMxODEwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzM4OTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"With their daughter, Blair, away, Luther and Nora Krank decide to skip Christmas all together until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate it at the last minute.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0388419/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"the-movie-guy"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Have a Merry slapstick Christmas","reviewBody":"For the first time, Luther Krank (Tim Allen) and his wife Nora (Jamie Lee Curtis) are about to celebrate the holidays without their daughter Blair (Julie Gonzalo), who has just left for the Peace Corps in Peru. Luther sees a Caribbean cruise poster in a Chicago travel agency window, and he begins to plan the trip. First he must see how he will pay for the trip, so he comes up with an idea that if they skipped Christmas, they could go. He will save money by not buying a tree, having a party, or putting up decorations. The neighbors think he is crazy and want him to at least put Frosty the Snowman on his roof for the local decoration contest. The battle begins between the Kranks and their neighbors. Then Blair calls and tells her parents that she is flying home for Christmas with her fiancée. They have twenty-four hours to put up all the decorations and prepare for the Christmas party. The movie was based on a John Grisham book, 'Skipping Christmas'. It is a cute Christmas story with a lot of funny slapstick sketches. It reminds you of the Chevy Chase movie, 'National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation'. Tim Allen does a great job in several comedy scenes, especially, the scenes where he gets bowtox injections in his face and the suntan scene. (Columbia Pictures, Run time 1:39, Rated PG) (5/10)"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45929,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2004-11-24","keywords":"bikini,christmas,cat,singing,arrest","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Christmas with the Kranks","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2092826905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk0MTdmNTItZTQwMC00MTk5LTkyZTYtYjdjMGNkMzBkZjEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk0MTdmNTItZTQwMC00MTk5LTkyZTYtYjdjMGNkMzBkZjEyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000741/","name":"Tim Allen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000130/","name":"Jamie Lee Curtis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005387/","name":"Joe Roth"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046151/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0125564/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001300/","name":"John Grisham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001060/","name":"Chris Columbus"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jack Frost
Jack Frost – Der coolste Dad der Welt
programme.desc:
Jack Frost: Directed by Troy Miller. With Michael Keaton, Kelly Preston, Joseph Cross, Mark Addy. A father who can't keep his promises dies in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0141109/","name":"Jack Frost","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE4YWIzNjItZWNhNi00Y2E1LTgyODktMTUzM2ZkMmJlNDFlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzYzMzA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A father who can't keep his promises dies in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0141109/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lee B"},"dateCreated":"2000-05-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"I admit it, I cried . . .","reviewBody":"Sorry everyone, but I liked this movie. I even cried at the end. My kids freaked when the snowman started to talk and move - one of them got scared by a guy in a teddy bear suit when she was about 3, and she hasn't got over it yet (2 yrs later). They had loved the start of the movie, with the snowball fight and building the first snowman, but as soon as the second snowman came to life we had to turn the video off.

I couldn't believe in Kelly Preston as the mother of an 11-yr-old boy, but in spite of that the casting was great. And Michael Keaton with blond hair is such a hunk . . .

Give it a go!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35136,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"1998-12-11","keywords":"character name as title,two word title,movie flop,altered version of studio logo,jack frost character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Jack Frost","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3282567449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjVkNjE0YTMtMzJmMS00NmYyLTgxZjYtMGM0YjU1NTZhMTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjVkNjE0YTMtMzJmMS00NmYyLTgxZjYtMGM0YjU1NTZhMTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000474/","name":"Michael Keaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000593/","name":"Kelly Preston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189200/","name":"Joseph Cross"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003474/","name":"Troy Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0025311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052111/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425756/","name":"Mark Steven Johnson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089237/","name":"Steve Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0731271/","name":"Jonathan Roberts"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="
